verses.verse: This<WG5124> is the third<WG5154> time I am coming<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG5209>. In<WG1909> the mouth<WG4750> of two<WG1417> or<WG2532> three<WG5140> witnesses<WG3144> shall<WG2476> every<WG3956> word<WG4487> be established<WG2476>.

I told you before<WG4280>, and<WG2532> say beforehand<WG4302>, as if<WG5613> I were present<WG3918>, the second time<WG1208>; and<WG2532> being absent<WG548> now<WG3568> I write<WG1125> to them<WG3588> which before have sinned<WG4258>, and<WG2532> to all<WG3956> others<WG3062>, that<WG3754>, if<WG1437> I come<WG2064><WG99999> again<WG3825>, I will<WG5339> not<WG3756> spare<WG5339>:

Since<WG1893> you seek<WG2212> a proof<WG1382> of Christ<WG5547> speaking<WG2980> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>, which<WG3739><WG99999> toward<WG5209> you is<WG770> not<WG3756> weak<WG770>, but<WG235> is mighty<WG1414> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>.

For<WG1063> though<WG2532> he was crucified<WG4717> through<WG1537> weakness<WG769>, yet<WG235> he lives<WG2198> by<WG1537> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316>. For<WG1063> we also<WG2249> are weak<WG770> in<WG846> him<WG235>, but<WG2198> we shall live<WG4862> with<WG846> him<WG1537> by<WG1411> the power<WG2316> of God<WG1519> toward<WG5209> you<WG1722>.

Examine<WG3985> yourselves<WG1438>, whether<WG1487> you are<WG2075> in<WG1722> the faith<WG4102>; prove<WG1381> your own selves<WG1438>. Don<WG3756>'t you know<WG1921> your own selves<WG1438>, how that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>, unless<WG1509> you are<WG2075><WG99999> reprobates<WG96>?
But<WG1161> I trust<WG1679> that<WG3754> you shall know<WG1097> that<WG3754> we<WG2249> are<WG2070> not<WG3756> reprobates<WG96>.

Now<WG1161> I pray<WG2172> to<WG4314> God<WG2316> that<WG4160> you<WG5209><WG99999> do<WG4160> no<WG3367> evil<WG2556>; not<WG3756> that<WG2443> we<WG2249> should appear<WG5316> approved<WG1384>, but<WG235> that<WG2443> you<WG5210> should do<WG4160> that which<WG3588> is honest<WG2570>, though<WG1161> we<WG2249> be<WG5600> as<WG5613> reprobates<WG96>.
For<WG1063> we can do<WG1410><WG99999> nothing<WG3756> against<WG2596> the truth<WG225>, but<WG235> for<WG5228> the truth<WG225>.

For<WG1063> we<WG2249> are glad<WG5463>, when<WG3752> we are weak<WG770>, and<WG1161> you<WG5210> are<WG5600> strong<WG1415>: and<WG1161> this<WG5124> also<WG2532> we wish<WG2172>, even your<WG5216> perfection<WG2676>.

Therefore<WG1223><WG99999> I write<WG1125> these things<WG5023> being<WG2443> absent<WG548>, lest<WG3361> being present<WG3918> I should use<WG5530> sharpness<WG664>, according<WG2596> to the power<WG1849> which<WG3739> the Lord<WG2962> has given<WG1325> me<WG3427> to<WG1519> edification<WG3619>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> to<WG1519> destruction<WG2506>.

Finally<WG3063>, brothers<WG80>, rejoice<WG5463>. Be perfected<WG2675>, be of good comfort<WG3870>, be<WG5426> of one<WG846> mind<WG5426>, live in peace<WG1514>; and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of love<WG26> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> shall be<WG2071> with<WG3326> you<WG5216>.
Greet<WG782> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> a holy<WG40> kiss<WG5370>.

The grace<WG5485> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> the love<WG26> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> the communion<WG2842> of the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151>, be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all<WG3956>. Amen<WG281>. The second letter to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
